content.rendered:
Undergraduates and Graduates

  Arrive By Orientation Semester Dates
Fall 2024 July 20 August 14 August 19 – December 15
Spring 2025 January 4 February 3 February 3 – June 1
Summer 2024 (Optional) May 11 June 7 June 10 – August 4
